description:
I use the code from the latest master trunk. After I sccessfully run ./stack.sh in devstack and try command nova image-list from the terminal. The nova-api log gives me the follwoing error. This will lead to that instances are not able to launch.

=========================Log of nova-api================
2012-06-19 15:49:44 ERROR nova.api.openstack [req-1044495b-9248-45cc-b761-565ddca36e34 a453422fee7a43f19ae7e0644a252ef0 5f8d8388747641e6b8672ca9038bae49] Caught error: [Errno 113] EHOSTUNREACH
2012-06-19 15:49:44 TRACE nova.api.openstack Traceback (most recent call last):
2012-06-19 15:49:44 TRACE nova.api.openstack   File "/opt/stack/nova/nova/api/openstack/__init__.py", line 41, in __call__
2012-06-19 15:49:44 TRACE nova.api.openstack     return req.get_response(self.application)
2012-06-19 15:49:44 TRACE nova.api.openstack   File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/WebOb-1.0.8-py2.7.egg/webob/request.py", line 1053, in get_response
2012-06-19 15:49:44 TRACE nova.api.openstack     application, catch_exc_info=False)
2012-06-19 15:49:44 TRACE nova.api.openstack   File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/WebOb-1.0.8-py2.7.egg/webob/request.py", line 1022, in call_application
2012-06-19 15:49:44 TRACE nova.api.openstack     app_iter = application(self.environ, start_response)
2012-06-19 15:49:44 TRACE nova.api.openstack   File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/WebOb-1.0.8-py2.7.egg/webob/dec.py", line 159, in __call__
2012-06-19 15:49:44 TRACE nova.api.openstack     return resp(environ, start_response)
2012-06-19 15:49:44 TRACE nova.api.openstack   File "/opt/stack/keystone/keystone/middleware/auth_token.py", line 181, in __call__
2012-06-19 15:49:44 TRACE nova.api.openstack     return self.app(env, start_response)
2012-06-19 15:49:44 TRACE nova.api.openstack   File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/WebOb-1.0.8-py2.7.egg/webob/dec.py", line 159, in __call__
2012-06-19 15:49:44 TRACE nova.api.openstack     return resp(environ, start_response)

2012-06-19 15:49:44 TRACE nova.api.openstack   File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/WebOb-1.0.8-py2.7.egg/webob/dec.py", line 159, in __call__

2012-06-19 15:49:44 TRACE nova.api.openstack     headers=headers)
2012-06-19 15:49:44 TRACE nova.api.openstack   File "/opt/stack/glance/glance/common/client.py", line 80, in wrapped

2012-06-19 15:49:44 TRACE nova.api.openstack   File "/opt/stack/glance/glance/common/client.py", line 589, in _do_request

title: nova-image list unable to work

comments.content:

comments.content: Has your IP changed from 9.119.148.171 to something else? Run "ifconfig" and see if that IP is assigned to any of your interfaces.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~danms

comments.content: The latest code does not have this issue any more. Thanks for your reply.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~houshengbo
